login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Thank you that you fight with us against the plague of fake news.
login.cta: Do you want to help us? Become one of the community fact-checkers!

register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: Thank you for your application! Register and join the DoFacts! community.
register.success: Registration was successful! <2>Go to login page</2>.
register.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In!
register.agreement: I agree to have my personal data processed within the scope necessary for the application to work.

passwordReset.title: Reset password
passwordReset.subtitle: Set a new password. The password should contain at least 8 characters, one upper case letter, number and special character.
passwordReset.success: Your password has been changed. Go to <2>login</2>.

passwordResetRequest.title: Reset password
passwordResetRequest.subtitle: Enter your email below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordResetRequest.success: Instructions to reset your password will be sent to you shortly. Please check your email.
